predictions.title: Riverside Beer House Opportunity
predictions.description: This area is located near the river, making it an ideal spot for a beer house. The scenic view and proximity to water can attract both locals and tourists, boosting hospitality and leisure business.
predictions.businessPotential: High potential for a themed beer house or pub, leveraging riverside ambiance for events and gatherings.

predictions.title: Transit Hub Coffee & Coworking Spot
predictions.description: Located near a busy transit station, this site is perfect for a hybrid coffee shop and coworking space catering to daily commuters and remote workers.
predictions.businessPotential: Strong potential for high foot traffic sales and daily recurring customers, especially during peak hours.

predictions.title: University Belt Affordable Eats
predictions.description: Surrounded by educational institutions, this area is ideal for a food park or student-friendly dine-in spots offering affordable meals.
predictions.businessPotential: Excellent opportunity for fast casual dining, maximizing foot traffic from students and faculty.

predictions.title: Highland Adventure & Camping Store
predictions.description: Near elevated and hilly terrain popular among hikers and bikers, this location suits an outdoor adventure and gear store.
predictions.businessPotential: Niche opportunity with potential to develop partnerships with tour groups and adventure clubs.

predictions.title: Tech Hub Gadget Repair and Accessories
predictions.description: Within a digital business district, this site is a great fit for a quick-service tech repair and accessories shop for professionals.
predictions.businessPotential: Consistent demand expected from gadget-heavy office workers and digital nomads.

predictions.title: Suburban Weekend Farmers' Market
predictions.description: This suburban area has limited access to fresh local produce. A weekly farmers' market could fulfill community needs and support local growers.
predictions.businessPotential: Community-driven model with low startup costs and strong potential for repeat visitors.

predictions.title: Seaside Wellness Retreat & Café
predictions.description: Located near the coast, this quiet area is well-suited for a wellness retreat center with an organic café, yoga space, and spa.
predictions.businessPotential: High potential for eco-tourism and wellness-focused travelers seeking holistic experiences.
